selection_logic.rule: BK3/BK4 require ALL 12 document types per BR18 §498
selection_logic.reason: Complex buildings requiring comprehensive fire safety documentation
triggers: Application category 5 (care facility with vulnerable occupants)
Risk class 3 (high risk due to mobility-impaired residents)

document_descriptions.ITT: Installationsteknisk tilsyn - Technical supervision during construction
document_descriptions.DBK: Dokumentation for brandtekniske installationer - Comprehensive fire system docs
document_descriptions.BPLAN: Brandstrategi - Complete fire strategy with scenarios
document_descriptions.PFP: Plan for periodisk funktionsafprøvning - Periodic testing schedule
document_descriptions.DIM: Dimensioneringsrapport - Detailed calculations for all fire measures
document_descriptions.FUNK: Funktionsbeskrivelse - Functional description of all fire systems
document_descriptions.KPLA: Kontrolplan - Quality control and inspection plan
document_descriptions.KRAP: Kontrolrapport - Control report from construction phase
document_descriptions.DKV: Drifts- og vedligeholdelsesplan - Operations and maintenance plan
document_descriptions.SLUT: Sluterklæring - Final declaration after completion and testing

excluded_documents.reason: BK3/BK4 requires the complete documentation package

reasons: Application category 5 (care facility) requires BK3 minimum
High occupancy density (120 people / 4500 m² = 1 person per 37.5 m²)
why_bk3_not_bk2.key_difference: BK3 adds KRAP, DKV, and SLUT to ensure long-term safety and maintenance

KRAP.name: Kontrolrapport
KRAP.purpose: Documents that all quality controls were performed during construction
KRAP.required_for: Complex buildings where construction quality is critical
KRAP.content: Test results, inspection reports, deviation handling

DKV.name: Drifts- og vedligeholdelsesplan
DKV.purpose: Ensures fire systems remain functional throughout building lifetime
DKV.content: Maintenance schedules, responsible parties, emergency procedures

SLUT.name: Sluterklæring
SLUT.purpose: Final certification that building is safe for occupancy
SLUT.content: Confirmation of all systems tested and functioning, handover documentation

special_requirements: CFD simulation likely required for smoke control in corridors
Detailed evacuation plan for mobility-impaired residents
Sprinkler system mandatory for care facilities
Voice alarm system (not just sounders) required for AK5
Weekly testing of fire alarm required (not just monthly)

why_this_is_complex: Comprehensive fire system integration (alarm, sprinkler, voice, emergency lighting)

notes: This is the full documentation package. BK3/BK4 projects require lifelong documentation from initial declaration through to final certification and ongoing maintenance. The additional documents (KRAP, DKV, SLUT) ensure the building remains safe throughout its operational lifetime.
